title: Welcome to the Bovi-Analytics lab
text:
Welcome to the Bovi-Analytics lab
        
        
            Combine data and dairy analytics into knowledge
        
        
            
        
    
    
      
        
        
        
      
    





Instructor

   Ass. Prof. Dr. Miel Hostens

Contacting me
E-mail and Slack are the best ways to get in contact with me. I will try to respond to all lab-related e-mails and Slack messages within 24 hours (I really do), but also remember that i’m RED so remind me if I don’t respond right away, don’t worry!
